data.title: Water Transport
data.meta_description: elective_3 - Free download as Powerpoint Presentation (.ppt / .pptx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or view presentation slides online. The document provides an overview of cruise sales management, describing what a cruise is, the different types of cruises available from mass market to luxury, key details about cruise lengths, amenities, activities, pricing factors, and common roadblocks people have to purchasing cruises. It also briefly discusses the history of company mergers in the cruise industry and top reasons why people enjoy taking cruises.
